inclusion.criterion: Be 8 years of age or older.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have solitary primary or recurrent brain tumor with associated seizures.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Associated seizures are defined as those with activity starting within three months of radiologic diagnosis of the primary or recurrent tumor.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients can be included if they have had a single previous seizure.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who have not experienced seizures after institution of anti-convulsant therapy are not excluded.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to appoint a durable power of attorney.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Have a bleeding disorder that cannot be corrected before invasive testing or surgery, or other medical conditions that would make surgery unsafe.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, and epilepsy. He presented with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.
